title.rendered: Canada’s First Law-and-Justice-Themed High School Program Launched

content.rendered: The University of Toronto, Faculty of Law and the Toronto District School Board (TDSB) launched Canada's first law-and-justice-themed high school program on April 28, to be implemented in two downtown high schools – Central Technical School and Harbord Collegiate Institute.
